# customActions

**Instance Property**

An array of custom actions supported by the entity, identified by their localized string key.

## Declaration

```swift
var customActions: [LocalizedStringResource]
```

## Specifying custom data

- **customContent**: An array of custom content objects that deliver accessibility information.

items.description: An array of custom content objects that deliver accessibility information.
items.name: customContent
